imdb.plot outline: Emily Schultz's beautifully realized novel is a mix of satire, thriller, and serious literary work. With biting satiric wit, The Blondes is at once an examination of the complex relationships between women and a merciless but giddily enjoyable portrait of what happens in a world where beauty is - literally - deadly.
imdb.title: The Blondes
plot: Emily Schultz's beautifully realized novel is a mix of satire, thriller, and serious literary work. With biting satiric wit, _The Blondes_ (qv) is at once an examination of the complex relationships between women and a merciless but giddily enjoyable portrait of what happens in a world where beauty is - literally - deadly.
